MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY2 postcode area of Kirkcaldy, affecting properties in Harris Drive and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable fault outside 70 Harris Drive, and we now expect your supply to be restored by 1.00am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.52PM on 25 April 2021.
